name: Space Lasers (Ecchi-Sensei)
description: The game is a shoot 'em up, inspired by the classics of the genre, the objective is to get to the end of the game by trying to defeat as many enemies as possible and thus obtain the best score. During the game you can find power ups such as: the increased rate of fire, the shield that protects the ship from enemy blows and the health recovery. The game is currently available on the android play store.
